docs.title: About me
docs.text:
I'm currently an undergraduate student in Mechanical Engineering at National Taiwan University and will be pursuing an M.S. in Electrical Engineering with a focus on speech processing and machine learning. My research experience includes working in the NTU Speech Processing Lab under Prof. Hung-Yi Lee, where I have explored test-time adaptation for speech recognition, spoken language modeling, and Dynamic-SUPERB.

I'm passionate about Machine Learning, speech processing, and real-world applications of deep learning. Feel free to connect! 🚀

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
National Taiwan University (Sep 2025 - 2027 (expected)) M.S. Electrical Engineering, EECS College - Speech Processing and Machine Learning Laboratory, advised by Prof. Hung-Yi Lee

National Taiwan University (Sep 2021 - Present) B.S. Mechanical Engineering, minor in Electrical Engineering

docs.title: Project
docs.text:
In my undergraduate studies, I have gained substantial experience in natural language processing (NLP) at the NTU Speech Processing Lab.

  • Test-Time Adaptation for Speech Recognition
  • Dynamic-SUPERB phase-2
  • Spoken Language Model

docs.title: Experience
docs.text: RD Intern at Taiwan Web Service (Jul 2024 - Jan 2025)

docs.title: Teaching Assistant
docs.text:
Introduction to Generative AI (Supervisor: Hung-Yi Lee)

I have worked as a teaching assistant for a course on Introduction to Generative AI, where I designed assignments on topics such as supervised fine-tuning for generating Tang poems and reinforcement learning with human feedback.

docs.title: 🏆 1st Place - TSMC IT CareerHack 2025 (Feb 2025)
docs.text: Issued by TSMC - Developed an AI Market Agent for real-time financial data analysis.

docs.title: 🏆 1st Place - Kibo Robot Programming Challenge World Final Round (Oct 2022)
docs.text: Issued by JAXA and NASA - Controlled a robot on the International Space Station to move and target objects efficiently. - Applied the PID algorithm to track object positions in a disturbance-prone environment.

docs.title: See Also
docs.text: VectorPro Project This is a reimplementation of the C++ vector by SunParis, offering faster performance than the standard C++ vector for operations such as Build, Insert, and Push.
